author: marrs
msg: Cleaned up the pom.xml files, centralizing dependencies and versions and making it easier to just checkout this project and build it. Also made sure that the appropriate parts of the dependency manager are now compiled against the standard OSGi execution environment instead of Java 5 (annotation related bundles and tests are excluded).

author: hibou
msg: - put the fix back again but only for input which is not a string or a file

author: cmpilato
msg: Lose some unused code.  "merged" is an action, not a state, so I'm not
sure why we ever had a status enum value for it.  Go figure.

author: tdunning
msg: Reverted a little bit of the Locale stuff.  I really
think it is better to use the default locale for normal
operations and only defeat that in testing.  Otherwise,
we really are treading on toes.
